title: Major U.S. Indices: Watch These Technicals

www.investing.com/analysis/major-us-indices-watch-these-technicals-200470453 Major U.S. Indices: Watch These Technicals By By Tim Knight | 5 hours ago (Oct 03, 2019 04:02PM ET)

Follow Wednesday was a true blessing. It provided a price gap that’s most valuable for charting and below I show several major cash indexes and what I consider to be crucial areas of medium-term resistance.
